creator: senthild@global.com
text:
setLandscape method of HSSFPrintSetup class accepts a boolean variable to set 
the orientation. Logically if i pass true then the orientation should be 
landscape. but only when i pass false the orientation is set to landscape. it 
can be changed

Created attachment 2010
Patch to fix this bug
creator: shawn.laubach@b1b.tinker.af.mil

text:
Here is a patch to fix this.  The internal record records a 0 for landscape 
mode and the record called this landscape and then the boolean functions said 
false.  I flip it in the usermodel.
creator: shawn.laubach@b1b.tinker.af.mil

text: Applied, thanks. Could you please verify?
creator: avik@apache.org
